survey.name: Do you have any experience of taking care of pets?
Are you willing to work in a house where there are pets?
Are you willing to work without any day off during the whole duration of contract?
Are you willing to work with muslim family?
Are you willing to work with non muslim family?
Are you willing not to use mobile during working hours?
Do you drink alcohol or smoke?
Have you ever suffered from any serious illness?
Will you be honest and loyal to your employer?
Do you promise not to use mobile without permission?
Are you aware of 2 years employment contract with your employer?
Do you promise not to answer back to your employer when points out your mistake?
Do you promise not to bring/invite friends or relatives to the house of your employer without permission?
Are your parent/husband allowed you to work as a Housemaid in Malaysia?
Are you ready to be separated from your family during your employment in Malaysia?
Are you physically and Mentally ready to work as a Housemaid in Malaysia?
